data.eml:eml: A new Cryptalyra species from Colombia (Hymenoptera: Megalyridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shaw, Scott Richard (2003): A new Cryptalyra species from Colombia (Hymenoptera: Megalyridae). Zootaxa 248: 1-4, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156233
